changes.title: Featured Update
content: **Added Quiz Command [development]**
- Includes various commands including `quizleaderboard` and `quizrank`
- Reworked from the previous quiz command
- Reduced Required Players from 4 players to 2
- Removed all categories except **Anime**
[prefix]quiz to start

changes.title: New Commands
content: **cry** [action] - Added cry on action command!
**suicide** [action] - Added suicide on action command!
**nhentai** [anime] [nsfw] - Added nhentai command. Searches for hdoujin title using the codes provided.
**readhentai** [anime] [development] - Added readhentai command to make it possible to read hentai doujin
**readmanga** [anime] [development] - Added readmanga command to make it possible to read manga
**seiyuu** [anime] - Added seiyuu command
**studio** [anime] - Added studio command. Searches for studios and displays various works from that studio
**waifu** [anime] - Added waifu command. Generates a random waifu.
**changelog** [bot] - Added command to be able to view the changelogs
**kaede** [core] - Added kaede command
**nodoka** [core] - Added nodoka command
**rio** [core] - Added rio command
**shoko** [core] - Added shoko command
**tomoe** [core] - Added tomoe command
**uzuki** [core] - Added uzuki command

changes.title: Command Changes
content: - Added Badges on Mal Profiles [anime]
- Set economy streak bonus currency limit to 7. Previously non-limited. [economy]
- Removed `whois` command ability to search for user across discord. Now only displays information when user is on the same server. [utility]

changes.title: Temporarily Removed
content: - All music commands were temporarily removed. They are currently placed under maintenance.

changes.title: Other Changes
content: - Changed Loading gif from rotating orange circes to Kaede dance
- Replaced next, previous, and cance embed buttons to custom emoji

changes.title: Bot Changed
content: - Replaced Bot Name from **Mai Sakurajima** to **Mai**

changes.title: Internal Changes
content: - Changed discord library from djs@11.6.4 to djs@12.0.2

changes.title: Added Website
content: - Added a new [website](https://maisans-maid.github.io/mai.moe).

changes.title: Commands Added
content: - Added anischedule command which enables the server moderators to set up airing anime to watch for.

changes.title: Commands Added
content: - Added music commands which enables user to play music through the bot.
- play - lets you play or queue selected titles
- nowplaying - lets you display the title of currently playing music
- pause - lets you pause the currently playing music
- queue - lets you display the list of queued music
- resume - lets you play the currently paused music
- skip - lets you skip the currently playing music
- stop - lets you stop the music player
- volume - lets you view the volume or change it

changes.title: Bug Fixes
content: - Fixed Bug allowing some users to use the moderation command

changes.title: Miscellaneous
content: - Various typo fixes

changes.title: Introduction of the Economy System [Development]
content: - Added economy system [in development]
